content: on instagram or ravelry by adding the hashtags #grainshawl finishing and #tincanknits - we love to see your knits weave in ends block your shawl if desired then wrap yourself up in luxury as you head out for a day with friends grain shawl from the simple collection © tin can knits 2020 www tincanknits com 2 tin can knits in vancouver + edinburgh www tincanknits com
